data.title: gofasta
data.description: provides functions for working on alignments in fasta format.
data.name: gofasta

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "If you have [Go](https://go.dev/) installed, you can run `go install github.com/virus-evolution/gofasta@latest` to build a binary of the latest release locally (maybe in `~/go/bin/`). Branches, commit"
"gofasta is a command-line utility developed to handle SARS-CoV-2 alignments, but should be useful more generally for handling consensus genomes of any microbial pathogen."
"You can install gofasta from Bioconda: `conda install bioconda::gofasta`"
